general_advisory: Farmers are advised to do weeding and hoeing in the standing crops like Maize, Groundnut, Green gram, Chick pea and vegetables to protect them from weeds. Apply balanced and appropriate fertilizers according to cropâ€™s growth stage. Install yellow sticky trap to monitor pests like White fly, Aphids, Jassids & Thirps in vegetables. Rouging of viral infested plant should be done. Use pheromone trap for monitoring borer insect in vegetables.

advisory: Apply light irrigation to the nursery beds as & when required.
Spray the nursery area with Tebuconazole + Trifloxystrobin to control blast infestation.
Go for puddling of main field and apply basal fertilizer.
Apply herbicide Bensulfuron methyl + Pretilachlor after transplanting to control weeds.
Keep a watch for pests like grasshopper, aphids and larvae in development stage.
Spray Emamectin benzoate to control infestation.
Spray Imidacloprid or Dimethoate in severe infestation.
Spray Profenophos or Quinalphos for saw fly control.
Keep a watch for pests like grasshopper, aphids and larvae in development stage.
Spray Emamectin benzoate to control infestation.
Spray Imidacloprid or Dimethoate in severe infestation.
Spray Profenophos or Quinalphos for saw fly control.
Spray Dimethoate for Little leaf control.
Spray Imidacloprid for aphids and Jassids management.
Apply Ethion or Propargite for mite infestation.
Spray Azoxystrobin or Zineb to control early and late blight.
Install yellow sticky trap to monitor white fly population.
Spray Dimethoate, Cyntranliprole, Thiamethoxam or Indoxacarb for chemical control.
Provide irrigation as per requirement.
Earth up the plants to prevent direct sun exposure.
Use Blitox -50 + Steptocycline drench in case of wilting.
Spray neem based pesticide to control fruit borer.
At later stages, apply Spinosad SC for further control.
